title: JAAL 1.1 edge
description: A graph edge in a JAAL recording.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node among all data structures.

node.description: A graph edge is defined by two nodes. If the graph is directed, the first node is the source and the second node is the target.

style.description: Graphical style of the node: a name of a style definition.

tag.description: Text displayed in the middle of the edge. E.g. name or weight of the edge.

tailElem.description: Data element at the tail (start) node of the edge.

headElem.description: Data element at the head (end) node of the edge.
